azurerm_network_ddos_protection_plan.description: Manages an Azure Network DDoS Protection Plan.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Network DDoS Protection Plan. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the DDoS Protection Plan

virtual_network_ids.description: A list of Virtual Network ID's associated with the DDoS Protection Plan.

create.description: Used when creating the DDoS Protection Plan.

update.description: Used when updating the DDoS Protection Plan.

read.description: Used when retrieving the DDoS Protection Plan.

delete.description: Used when deleting the DDoS Protection Plan.
